refId_default.Wiki: Defines what Bullet or SpEffects will be invoked when the item is used

sellValue.Wiki: Amount of Sen that will be obtained when selling this item

replaceItemId.Wiki: When the item is empty it will be replaced with this item

qwcId.Wiki: World Tendency shenanigans, not relevant to Sekiro

yesNoDialogMessageId.Wiki: Message ID used when displaying the YesNo dialog

actionUnlockParamId.Wiki: When this item is in your inventory the Action referenced here will be unlocked

compTrophySedId.Wiki: Category for unlocking trophies/achievements, when you have all the items with same category the corresponding trophy will be unlocked

maxNum.Wiki: Maximum amount of this item that can be held

consumeHeroPoint.Wiki: Consume humanity when using the item, not relevant to Sekiro

refCategory.Wiki: Determines what param is referenced when this item is used

goodsUseAnim.Wiki: Defines the animation used when the item is used

opmeMenuType.Wiki: What menu type does this item open if it opens a menu at all?

enable_live.Wiki: Can the item be used if you are alive?

enable_gray.Wiki: Can the item be used if you are an online spirit?

enable_white.Wiki: Can this item be used if you are a white phantom?

enable_black.Wiki: Can this item be used if you are a black phantom?

enable_multi.Wiki: Can this item be used during multiplayer

disable_offline.Wiki: Can this item be use while offline?

isEquip.Wiki: Can the item be equipped to the item bar?

isConsume.Wiki: Will the item be consumed when it is used?

isAutoEquip.Wiki: Will the item be equipped to the item bar automatically when the item is obtained

isOnlyOne.Wiki: Can you have more than one of this item?

isDeposit.Wiki: Can the item be sent to storage

isDisableHand.Wiki: When enabled, item can't be used when there isn't a weapon equipped in the right hand

isSuppleItem.Wiki: If the item is replensiable(i.e. Gourds) this item is considered the empty item

isFullSuppleItem.Wiki: If this item is replensiable(i.e. Gourds) this item is considered the full item

disableMultiDropShare.Wiki: Can this item be dropped during multiplayer?

disableUseAtColiseum.Wiki: Can this item be used in the arena?

disableUseAtOutOfColiseum.Wiki: Can this item be used outside the arena?

isEnableFastUseItem.Wiki: Is it possible to cancel early?

isApplySpecialEffect.Wiki: Will this item be affect by SpEffect corrections?

refId_1.Wiki: Defines what Bullet or SpEffects will be invoked when the item is used

refVirtualWepId.Wiki: References weapons to apply base damage and scaling

castSfxId.Wiki: Sfx spawned when the item is used but before the effect is activated

fireSfxId.Wiki: Sfx spawned when the item's effect is triggered

effectSfxId.Wiki: Sfx spawned after the item's effect has been triggered

enable_Ladder.Wiki: Item can be used while on a ladder

isNoticeLog.Wiki: When the item is obtained a UI indicator will appear above the Sen counter on the right hand side of the screen, does not pause gameplay

isNoticeDialog.Wiki: When the item is obtained a UI indicator will appear in the middle of the screen, pauses gameplay

enable_EmptyHand.Wiki: Can the item be used while the sword is sheathed?

enable_Swimming.Wiki: Can the item be used while swimming abovewater?

enable_Diving.Wiki: Can the item be used while swimming underwater?

enable_CantStand.Wiki: Can it be used while crouching in a place where the ceiling is too low to stand up?

enable_CantClimbHang.Wiki: Can it be used while hanging without being able to climb?

maxRepositoryNum.Wiki: Maximum amount that can be stored in storage

enable_Hang.Wiki: Can the item be used while hanging while being able to climb up?

saleValue.Wiki: Amount of Sen this item is sold for

consumeResourceItemA.Wiki: Amount of ResourceItemA that will be consumed when this item is used (Spirit Emblems)

consumeResourceItemB.Wiki: Amount of ResourceItemB that will be consumed when this item is used (Unused Emblem)

consumeResourceItemC.Wiki: Amount of ResourceItemC that will be consumed when this item is used (Unused Emblem)

maxReplaceItemId.Wiki: When you reach or exceed the maximum amount of this item, this item will be replaced with the item defined here

firstGetEventFlagId.Wiki: Sets the event flag defined here when this item is first obtained

overEquipPtyMaxType.Wiki: What happens when you aquire the item when you have full storage and max amount in inventory?

itemUIDisplayType.Wiki: Determines the rarity of the item

useGetItem.Wiki: When enabled, you will recieve items defined in useGetItemId

useGetItemCate.Wiki: Determines what item category you will receive

consumeHpRate.Wiki: Cosumes a percentage of Hp when this item is used, can't be used if your current Hp is less than or equal to the requirement

useGetItemId.Wiki: Items that will be awarded when this item is used

useGetItemNum.Wiki: Amount of items that will be recieved

useLimitSpEffectType0.Wiki: Prevents the item from being used if the stateInfo defined here is present

useLimitSpEffectType1.Wiki: Prevents the item from being used if the stateInfo defined here is present

useLimitSpEffectType2.Wiki: Prevents the item from being used if the stateInfo defined here is present

useLimitSpEffectType3.Wiki: Prevents the item from being used if the stateInfo defined here is present

useLimitSpEffectType4.Wiki: Prevents the item from being used if the stateInfo defined here is present
